snippet.title: Uncursed - Gameplay Showcase #1
snippet.description:
Ahoy, mates! 🏴‍☠️ 

☠️ Let us introduce you our co-op, pirate-themed adventure game: Uncursed! Forget your typical pirate adventure—this one’s got swimming possibility, spirits, procedurally generated dungeons, poop and drunkenness.

🌴 Explore islands teeming with danger and treasure.
🕸️ Navigate procedurally generated dungeons filled with puzzles, traps, and lurking threats.
👻 Rescue lost souls and harness Spirit Points to unlock helpful abilities.
🌌 Experience a world bound by a unique lore, shaped by 3 moons and ancient legends.
⚓ Work together with your crew to build your ship and sail to distant waters.

🎥 This is just the beginning — stay tuned for updates as we bring this world to life!
🌊 Support our journey by liking, commenting, and subscribing!

-----------------------------------------------------------

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2889760/Uncursed/
Discord:  https://discord.gg/9nWUKb6Hze
Website: https://kreadigma.com/
Patreon: https://patreon.com/Kreadigma/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/kreadigma.studio
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kreadigma
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@kreadigma
X: https://x.com/Kreadigma
